founders.name: Dr. Swatheeshwaran
founders.bio: Dr. Swatheeshwaran, MPT Sports, is the founder of ATREUS PHYSIO and a clinician who believes in science driven, movement centred rehabilitation. His practice focuses on helping people return to an active, confident and pain free life.
founders.shortBio: Dr. Swatheeshwaran, MPT Sports, is the founder of ATREUS PHYSIO and a clinician who believes in science driven, movement centred rehabilitation. His practice focuses on helping people return to an active, confident and pain free life.
founders.experience: He has worked as an Assistant Professor for three years, trained institutional and professional athletes, and delivered rehabilitation for high performance sport environments. His on field experience includes serving as physiotherapist for multiple major national, state and inter university events.

national: All India Aquatics, Beach Volleyball, Badminton, Basketball Championships (2023 to 2024)
state: TNBA Basketball Championships: Junior, Senior and State categories (2021 to 2022)

founders.approach: His approach combines clear assessment, movement analysis and evidence based loading to guide both recovery and performance. Treatment is structured to help patients return to daily function, return to sport and train with confidence. Every session focuses on clear communication so progress feels predictable, safe and understood.

services.title: Pain Management
services.excerpt: Assessment first, movement correction, and progressive exercises to restore confidence.

details.feels: Localised pain, stiffness, reduced movement or recurring flare ups.
details.expect: A clear explanation of why the pain is happening and a structured plan to reduce symptoms.
details.approach: Assessment first, movement correction, progressive exercises and load planning to restore confidence.

services.title: Sports Rehab
services.excerpt: Biomechanics based rehab, sport specific loading, and return to sport steps.

details.feels: Injury during training, reduced performance, difficulty returning to sport or repeated setbacks.
details.expect: A plan that matches the demands of their sport with clear return to sport steps.
details.approach: Biomechanics based rehab, sport specific loading, movement retraining and strength progressions.

services.title: Post Surgical Rehab
services.excerpt: Guided recovery with structured milestones and safe progression.

details.feels: Weakness, restricted mobility, swelling or difficulty regaining function after surgery.
details.expect: Guided recovery with structured milestones and safe progression.
details.approach: Controlled mobility, gradual strengthening, gait and movement retraining, and long term function building.

services.title: Spine Care
services.excerpt: Movement analysis, spinal mechanics, targeted exercise and strength conditioning.

details.feels: Neck pain, low back pain, radiating symptoms or stiffness.
details.expect: Understanding of triggers, relief strategies and long term movement confidence.
details.approach: Movement analysis, spinal mechanics, targeted exercise and strength conditioning.

conditions.title: Knee Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain arising from the joint, soft tissues or loading mechanics around the knee.
conditions.symptoms: Pain during walking, squatting, stairs or sport activities.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If pain limits daily activity or keeps recurring.

conditions.title: Back Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain from spinal joints, discs or soft tissue sensitivity influenced by load and movement.
conditions.symptoms: Stiffness, tightness, sharp episodes or discomfort with bending and lifting.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If pain affects work, sleep or daily function.

conditions.title: Neck Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain arising from cervical joints, muscles or load intolerance.
conditions.symptoms: Difficulty turning, tightness, headaches or radiating discomfort.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If symptoms persist or limit movement.

conditions.title: Shoulder Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain from rotator cuff tissues, joint structures or movement coordination issues.
conditions.symptoms: Pain during lifting, reaching, overhead tasks or sleep.

conditions.title: Ankle Injuries
conditions.whatItIs: Sprains or load related issues affecting ankle stability and movement control.
conditions.symptoms: Swelling, instability or pain during walking or sport.

conditions.title: Ligament Injuries
conditions.whatItIs: Injury to stabilising ligaments in joints like the knee or ankle.
conditions.symptoms: Instability, swelling or difficulty with weight bearing and sport.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If the joint feels unstable or recovery slows.

conditions.title: Muscle Strains
conditions.whatItIs: Injury to muscle fibres due to sudden effort or excessive load.
conditions.symptoms: Local pain, tightness, reduced strength or discomfort on stretch.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If pain limits movement or sport performance.

conditions.title: Sciatica
conditions.whatItIs: Radiating leg pain due to neural sensitivity or spinal mechanics.
conditions.symptoms: Leg pain, numbness, tingling or difficulty with prolonged standing or walking.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If symptoms persist or worsen over time.
